mapper.select: select student_info.STU_Name AS student_name, student_info.STU_Sex AS sex, DATE_FORMAT(student_info.STU_Birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthDate, school_register.*, Convert(Convert(Date_Format(now(),'%Y'),UNSIGNED) - Convert(substring(student_info.STU_Birth, 1, 4),UNSIGNED) +1,CHAR) AS age , school_info.school_name, school_register.class as 'class_id' from student_info inner join school_register on student_info.Student_ID = school_register.Student_ID inner join school_info on school_register.School_ID = school_info.School_ID where student_info.student_id = #{student_id} order by school_year desc limit 1

select body_measure_plan.*, body_measure_plan.class as 'class_id', school_info.school_name, inbody_info.* from body_measure_plan inner join inbody_info on body_measure_plan.Inbody_seq = inbody_info.Inbody_seq inner join school_info on body_measure_plan.SCHOOL_ID = school_info.School_ID where student_id = #{student_id} and body_measure_plan.Inbody_seq is not null order by Measure_Date desc LIMIT 2;

SELECT truncate(avg(inbody_info.HEIGHT), 1) as heightAverageOfSchool, truncate(avg(inbody_info.Weight), 1) as weightAverageOfSchool, count(*) as totalNumberOfSchool FROM student_info inner join body_measure_plan on student_info.Student_ID = body_measure_plan.Student_ID inner join inbody_info on body_measure_plan.Inbody_seq = inbody_info.Inbody_seq WHERE stu_sex = #{sex} and body_measure_plan.school_id = #{school_id} and body_measure_plan.grade_id = #{grade_id} AND DATE_FORMAT(body_measure_plan.Measure_Date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{measure_date}, '%Y%m');

select ms_grade_data.Srandard_Grade as bodyForm, start_int, end_int from ms_grade_data, standard_data where ms_grade_data.Grade_ID = #{grade_id} and ms_grade_data.sex = #{sex} and ms_grade_data.Section = 'BMI' and standard_data.Year = '2012' and standard_data.Ms_Grade_ID = ms_grade_data.Ms_Grade_ID and standard_data.Start_Int <= #{bmi} and standard_data.End_Int > #{bmi};
